___created_by.description: Lab or Company that produced the modfication
___created_by.title: Created By

___constructs.description: Recombinant constructs used to make modification.
___constructs.title: Constructs

___guide_rnas.description: The guide RNA sequences used in Crispr targetting.
___guide_rnas.title: Guide RNAs

items.description: Sequence of the guide RNA - submit as DNA (i.e. T not U) can include the PAM motif that is not actually part of the transcribed target and should not include the tracrRNA so that the sequence submitted reflects the genomic sequence
items.title: Guide RNA

___description.description: A brief plain text description of the modification.
___description.title: Description

___genomic_change.description: How the target of the modification is changed - i.e. deletion, insertion.
___genomic_change.title: The type of modification

___target_of_mod.description: The gene or genomic region that is targeted by the modification.
___target_of_mod.title: Target of Modification

___modified_regions.description: Modified genomic regions (if different than target)
___modified_regions.title: Modified Regions

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the construct.
___url.title: URL

___modification_type.description: The method used to make the genomic modification.
___modification_type.title: Genomic modification method

___override_modification_name.description: A curated modification name that will override the calculated properties - aim for short and descriptive
